# The litespeed SAPI

Configure the `litespeed` PHP SAPI.

> [!NOTE]
> The PHP Litespeed SAPI is not available when the target system is Windows.

## PHP_SAPI_LITESPEED

* Default: `OFF`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Enable the LiteSpeed SAPI module.
